error_timeout: Connection timed out. Please try again.
error_no_connection: No internet connection. Please check your network.
error_server: Server error occurred. Please try again later.
error_rate_limited: Too many requests. Please try again later.
error_rate_limited_with_retry: Too many requests. Please try again in %1$d seconds.
error_session_expired: Session expired. Please log in again.
error_invalid_email: Please enter a valid email address
error_weak_password: Password must be at least 8 characters
error_name_min_length: Name must be at least 2 characters
error_password_no_uppercase: Password must contain an uppercase letter
error_password_no_lowercase: Password must contain a lowercase letter
error_password_no_special_character: Password must contain a special character
